String.Name: para
String.Val: {term}Frequency modulation synthesis{/term} ({term}FM synthesis{/term}) creates a rich spectrum using only two sinusoidal oscillators; refer to {cnxn document="m????"}FM Mathematics{/cnxn} for a complete treatment of the mathematics of FM synthesis. Implementing the basic FM synthesis equation in LabVIEW requires a special technique in order to make one sinusoidal oscillator vary the {emphasis}phase function{/emphasis} of the other sinusoidal oscillator. The following screencast module walks you through the process of implementing the basic FM equation, and also includes an audio demonstration of the equation in action.

String.Name: caption
String.Val: Implmenting the basic FM synthesis equation in LabVIEW.
